languages.text: "Вот как..." {n}Кассия вскидывает чуть дрожащий подбородок, и сложная гамма чувств отражается в ее алых глазах.{/n} "По правилам этикета вы не должны сообщать мне об этом лично. Так я хотя бы могла сохранить лицо".

traits.locale_text: "Вот как..." {n}Кассия вскидывает чуть дрожащий подбородок, и сложная гамма чувств отражается в ее алых глазах.{/n} "По правилам этикета вы не должны сообщать мне об этом лично. Так я хотя бы могла сохранить лицо".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "I see..." {n}Cassia raises her slightly trembling chin and a complex array of emotions roils in her scarlet eyes.{/n} "It is breaking the rules of etiquette to tell me directly. If you had said nothing, it would have allowed me to save face."
languages.original_text: "Вот как..." {n}Кассия вскидывает чуть дрожащий подбородок, и сложная гамма чувств отражается в ее алых глазах.{/n} "По правилам этикета вы не должны сообщать мне об этом лично. Так я хотя бы могла сохранить лицо".

traits.locale_text: "I see..." {n}Cassia raises her slightly trembling chin and a complex array of emotions roils in her scarlet eyes.{/n} "It is breaking the rules of etiquette to tell me directly. If you had said nothing, it would have allowed me to save face."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I see..." {n}Cassia raises her slightly trembling chin and a complex array of emotions roils in her scarlet eyes.{/n} "It is breaking the rules of etiquette to tell me directly. If you had said nothing, it would have allowed me to save face."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I see..." {n}Cassia raises her slightly trembling chin and a complex array of emotions roils in her scarlet eyes.{/n} "It is breaking the rules of etiquette to tell me directly. If you had said nothing, it would have allowed me to save face."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I see..." {n}Cassia raises her slightly trembling chin and a complex array of emotions roils in her scarlet eyes.{/n} "It is breaking the rules of etiquette to tell me directly. If you had said nothing, it would have allowed me to save face."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Ya veo...». {n}Cassia levanta una barbilla temblorosa, y un complejo torbellino de emociones bulle en sus ojos color escarlata.{/n} «Al decírmelo directamente ha vulnerado las normas de cortesía. Si no hubiera abierto la boca, me habría permitido guardar las apariencias».
languages.original_text: "I see..." {n}Cassia raises her slightly trembling chin and a complex array of emotions roils in her scarlet eyes.{/n} "It is breaking the rules of etiquette to tell me directly. If you had said nothing, it would have allowed me to save face."

traits.locale_text: «Ya veo...». {n}Cassia levanta una barbilla temblorosa, y un complejo torbellino de emociones bulle en sus ojos color escarlata.{/n} «Al decírmelo directamente ha vulnerado las normas de cortesía. Si no hubiera abierto la boca, me habría permitido guardar las apariencias».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「そう…ですか…」{n}カシアは微かに震える顎を上げ、緋色の瞳には複雑な感情が渦巻いている。{/n}「私に直接言うのはエチケットに反することになります。何も言わなければ、私は恥をかかずにすんだでしょうに」
languages.original_text: "I see..." {n}Cassia raises her slightly trembling chin and a complex array of emotions roils in her scarlet eyes.{/n} "It is breaking the rules of etiquette to tell me directly. If you had said nothing, it would have allowed me to save face."

traits.locale_text: 「そう…ですか…」{n}カシアは微かに震える顎を上げ、緋色の瞳には複雑な感情が渦巻いている。{/n}「私に直接言うのはエチケットに反することになります。何も言わなければ、私は恥をかかずにすんだでしょうに」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “我明白了……”{n}卡西娅抬起微微颤抖的下巴，绯红的双眼中涌动着复杂的情感。{/n}“直接告诉实在是太有失礼节了。如果你什么都不说的话，我本可以挽回些面子。”
languages.original_text: "I see..." {n}Cassia raises her slightly trembling chin and a complex array of emotions roils in her scarlet eyes.{/n} "It is breaking the rules of etiquette to tell me directly. If you had said nothing, it would have allowed me to save face."

traits.locale_text: “我明白了……”{n}卡西娅抬起微微颤抖的下巴，绯红的双眼中涌动着复杂的情感。{/n}“直接告诉实在是太有失礼节了。如果你什么都不说的话，我本可以挽回些面子。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Je vois... » {n}Cassia relève son menton tremblant tandis qu'un tourbillon d'émotions traverse ses yeux écarlates.{/n} « Vous avez enfreint l'étiquette en me le disant directement. J'aurais pu sauver la face si vous vous étiez {mf|contenté|contentée} de garder le silence. »
languages.original_text: "I see..." {n}Cassia raises her slightly trembling chin and a complex array of emotions roils in her scarlet eyes.{/n} "It is breaking the rules of etiquette to tell me directly. If you had said nothing, it would have allowed me to save face."

traits.locale_text: « Je vois... » {n}Cassia relève son menton tremblant tandis qu'un tourbillon d'émotions traverse ses yeux écarlates.{/n} « Vous avez enfreint l'étiquette en me le disant directement. J'aurais pu sauver la face si vous vous étiez {mf|contenté|contentée} de garder le silence. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Ich verstehe ..." {n}Cassia hebt Ihr leicht zitterndes Kinn. In ihren scharlachroten Augen ringt ein komplexes Gemenge von Emotionen miteinander.{/n} "Es widerstößt gegen die Regeln der Etikette, es mir direkt zu sagen. Hättet Ihr gar nichts gesagt, hätte ich mein Gesicht wahren können."
languages.original_text: "I see..." {n}Cassia raises her slightly trembling chin and a complex array of emotions roils in her scarlet eyes.{/n} "It is breaking the rules of etiquette to tell me directly. If you had said nothing, it would have allowed me to save face."

traits.locale_text: "Ich verstehe ..." {n}Cassia hebt Ihr leicht zitterndes Kinn. In ihren scharlachroten Augen ringt ein komplexes Gemenge von Emotionen miteinander.{/n} "Es widerstößt gegen die Regeln der Etikette, es mir direkt zu sagen. Hättet Ihr gar nichts gesagt, hätte ich mein Gesicht wahren können."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "I see..." {n}Cassia raises her slightly trembling chin and a complex array of emotions roils in her scarlet eyes.{/n} "It is breaking the rules of etiquette to tell me directly. If you had said nothing, it would have allowed me to save face."

languages.text: "Anlıyorum..." {n}Cassia, çenesi hafifçe titreye titreye başını kaldırıyor. Kızıl gözlerinde karmakarışık duygular çalkalanıyor.{/n} "Bunu bana doğrudan söylemen, adabımuaşerete aykırı. Suskunluğa bürünseydin rezil olmazdım."
languages.original_text: "I see..." {n}Cassia raises her slightly trembling chin and a complex array of emotions roils in her scarlet eyes.{/n} "It is breaking the rules of etiquette to tell me directly. If you had said nothing, it would have allowed me to save face."

traits.locale_text: "Anlıyorum..." {n}Cassia çenesi hafifçe titreye titreye başını kaldırıyor. Kızıl gözlerinde karmakarışık duygular çalkalanıyor.{/n} "Bunu bana doğrudan söylemen, adabımuaşerete aykırı. Suskunluğa bürünseydin rezil olmazdım."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
